testcase.classname: Feature to test the user management
testcase.name: Verify search And reset functionality in user management - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user is in user management page...................................passed And user notes the total records of the users...............................passed When user searches with search parameters "Admin", "Admin", "hjhjhj kumar", "Enabled".passed And clicks on Search button.................................................passed Then the searched user is displayed with the "(1) Record Found".............passed When the user clicks on Reset button........................................passed Then the values in all of the search parameters should be removed...........passed And it should show all the records..........................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test the user management
testcase.name: Verify search And reset functionality in user management - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user is in user management page...................................passed And user notes the total records of the users...............................passed When user searches with search parameters "Admin", "Admin", "hjhjhj kumar", "Disabled".passed And clicks on Search button.................................................passed Then the searched user is displayed with the "No Records Found".............passed When the user clicks on Reset button........................................passed Then the values in all of the search parameters should be removed...........passed And it should show all the records..........................................passed
